Attached to this message is a flyer and registration form for the 
Cantera Workshop, which will be held Sunday, July 25 at the Holiday Inn 
Chicago Downtown.  Note that space is limited, so please register early 
if you want to attend.

The morning will be a tutorial, focusing on using Cantera from Matlab 
and/or Python, but could also cover C++ if there is sufficient 
interest.  CDs will be available with the latest versions of Cantera 
and supporting software for Windows,, Mac OS X,  and linux, plus all 
workshop materials.  If you bring your laptop (optional), you can 
install/upgrade Cantera on the spot and work along with the tutorial.

in the afternoon, there will be an opportunity for some of you to 
describe how you are using Cantera.  If you are using Cantera in 
teaching, or in research, or in other ways, please consider giving a 
short (~15 minute) presentation about your application.  On your 
registration form, note at the bottom any topic you would be interested 
in presenting, and I'll contact you about it.

We will finish by 3 pm at the latest.  Hope to see you there.


Dave


--Apple-Mail-2--533589216
